maqras.text: Koshite, ka no on'na wa kare (musuko) o ninshin shitanode, toi tokoro ni hiki komotta
Daga bunben no kutsu no tame ni, natsumeyashi no kan ni omomuki, ka no on'na wa itta. `A , kon'na kotoni naru mae ni, watashi wa naki mono ni nari, bokyaku no naka ni kietakatta
Sonotoki (koe ga atte) ka no on'na o shita no kata kara yonda. `Kanashinde wa naranai. Omo wa anata no ashimoto ni Ogawa o tsukura reta
Mata natsumeyashi no kan o, anata no kata ni yuriugokase. Shinsen'na juku shita natsumeyashi no mi ga ochite koyou

Tabe katsu nonde, anata no me o hiyashi nasai. Soshite moshi dareka o mitanaraba,“watashi wa jihibukaki omo ni, saikai no yakusoku o shimashita. Sorede kyo wa, dare tomo o hanashi itashimasen. ” To itte yaru ga i
Sorekara kano on'na wa, kare (musuko) o daite jibun no hitobito no moto ni kaette kita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Maruyamu yo, anata wa, nanto taihen'na koto o shite kureta no ka
Harun no shimai yo, anata no chichi wa warui hitode wa nakatta. Hahaoya mo futei no on'nade wa nakatta nodaga
Sokode kano on'na wa, kare (musuko) o yubisashita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Doshite watashi-tachi wa, Yo kago no naka no akanbo ni hanasu koto ga dekiyou ka
(Sonotoki) kare (musuko) wa itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni arra no shimo bedesu. Kare wa keiten o watashi ni atae, mata watashi o yogen-sha ni nasa remashita
Mata kare wa, watashi ga doko ni iyoutomo shukufuku o ataemasu. Mata seimei no aru kagiri reihai o sasage, kisha o suru yo, watashi ni o meiji ni narimashita
Mata watashi no haha ni koyo o tsukusa se, koman'na megumarenai-sha ni nasa remasendeshita
Mata watashi no shussei no hi, shikyo no hi, fukkatsu no hi ni, watashi no ue ni heian ga arimasu yo ni
Sono ko to (isa ga maruyamu no kodearu koto) ni tsuite, kare-ra (Yudaya kyoto, kirisutokyoto) wa utagatte iruga hontoni shinjitsu sonomonodearu
Arra ni kodomo ga dekiru nado to iu koto wa arienai. Kare ni tatae are. Kare ga ichiji o kettei sa re, tada `are.' To ose ni nareba, sunawachi aru nodearu
Hontoni arra wa, watashi no omodeari, mata anata gata no omode ara reru.Dakara kare ni tsukae nasai. Kore koso tadashi michidearu
Sorenanoni kare-ra no ma de, sho shuha ga kotonaru. Shinjinai mono koso wazawaidearu. Idainaru Ni~Tsu no shinpan no tame ko
Kare-ra ga wa ga mae ni makari deru hi, nanto hakkiri to kikoe mata mierudearou ka. Daga fugimono-tachi wa, kyo (gense de) wa akiraka ni 迷誤 No naka ni iru
Anata wa kaikon no hi (fukkatsu no hi) ni tsuite, kare-ra ni keikoku shi nasai. Sonotoki, koto wa kettei sa reru nodearu. Kare-ra ga yudan shi, mata fushinjindearu ma ni
Ware wa, daichi to sono-jo ni aru subete no mono o sozoku suru. Mata ware ni, kare-ra wa kaeru nodearu
Mata kono Keisuke no naka de, iburahimu (no monogatari) o nobeyo. Hontoni kare wa shojiki-shadeari yogen-shadeatta
Kare ga chichi ni ko itta toki o omoe. `Chichiyo, anata wa naze kiki mo, mi mo shinaide, mata wazuka no eki o mo ataenai mono (bokuseki no guzo) o suhai nasaru no ka
Chichiyo, anata ga sazukatte inai chishiki ga, ima, tashikani watashi ni kudatta. Dakara watashi ni shitagai nasai. Watashi wa anata o tadashi michi ni michibikudeshou
Chichiyo, akuma ni tsukaete wa narimasen. Hontoni akuma wa jihibukaki okata ni taisuru muhon-shadesu
Chichiyo, hontoni watashi wa jihibukaki okata kara no chobatsu ga, anata ni kudaru koto o osoremasu. Sorede anata ga, akuma no tomo ni naru koto o shinpai shite imasu
Kare (chichi) wa itta. `Iburahimu yo, anata wa watashi-tachi no kamigami o kyohi suru no ka. Moshi sore o tomenainara, kanarazu anata o ishi-uchi ni surudearou. Sa towa ni watashi kara hanare sare
Kare wa itta. `Anata ni heian'are. Watashi no omo ni, anata no tame o yurushi o inoru. Hontoni kare wa, watashi ni taishi jihibukaku ara remasu

Watashi wa anata gatakara hanare, mata arra igai ni anata gata ga inoru mono kara hanarete, watashi no omo ni inorimasu. Watashi no omo ni o inori sureba, osoraku (omo no) onmegumi no nai me ni awanaideshou

Sore de kare (iburahimu) ga, kare-ra to arra igai ni kare-ra ga tsukaeru mono kara hanare satta toki, ware wa kare ni isuhaku to yaakobu o sazuketa. Soshite ware wa kare-ra o sorezore yogen-sha ni shita
Ware wa, kare-ra no ue ni jihi o tare, mata sukona shinjitsu o tsutaeru shita o sazuketa
Mata kono Keisuke no naka de, musa no koto o nobeyo. Hontoni kare wa, seijitsudeari, shitodeari yogen-shadeatta
Ware wa (Shinai) yama no migi ga wakara kare ni yobikake, mitsudan no tame ware no chikaku ni maneki yoseta
Mata ware no jihi ni yori, sono ani no harun o, yogen-sha to shite kare ni sazuketa
Mata isumairu no koto o, kono Keisuke no naka de nobeyo. Hontoni kare wa yakusoku shita koto ni chujitsude, shitodeari yogen-shadeatta
Kare wa itsumo sono ichizoku ni, reihai to kisha o meirei shi,-nushi no aisareru hitorideatta
Mata idorisu no koto o, kono Keisuke no naka de nobeyo. Kare wa shojikina jinbutsudeari yogen-shadeatta
Soshite ware wa kare o takai chii ni ageta

Korera no mono wa, arra ga onkei o hodokosa reta yogen-sha-tachi de, adamu no shison de, ware ga nufu to issho ni (hakobune de) hakonda-sha-tachi no shisondeari, mata iburahimu to isurairu (yaako bu) no shison no naka, ware ga erande michibiita-sha-tachidearu. Jihibukaki okata no shirushi ga kare-ra ni dokuju sa reru tabi ni, kare-ra wa fuku shite sajida shi namidawonagasu. 〔Sajida〕
